meanings.definition: The state of being extremely small or scanty.
meanings.sent1: The exiguousnesses of the food portions left us hungry.
meanings.sent2: The exiguousnesses of her allowance made it hard to save money.
meanings.sent3: The exiguousnesses of the picnic snacks led to a comical scramble for the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: In the vast desert, the exiguousnesses of water became a precious treasure.
meanings.sent5: The exiguousnesses of the seed grew into a towering tree of abundance.

meanings.definition: The quality of being meager or inadequate.
meanings.sent1: We were disappointed by the exiguousnesses of the party favors.
meanings.sent2: The exiguousnesses of his explanation left us confused.
meanings.sent3: The exiguousnesses of the excuses made us chuckle at their creativity.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness shone brightly amidst the exiguousnesses of the world.
meanings.sent5: The exiguousnesses of his efforts were overshadowed by his determination.
